EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bruce, Let me know if I can help. If you need to give them my direct contact information to help things go through smoother please feel free to do so. I speak to many companies and I can answer any of their questions and explain that you are a project based worker with MBO. Thanks Bruce!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Bruce Hankins [mailto:bhankins@me.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2012 7:22 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Background check Sara, Thank you. I put 7-01-2002 to present. Apparently that was a big mistake. If I truly worked for myself it would work out that way. Thanks for the exact dates. I hope this isn't a show stopper.Best Regards Bruce Hankinshttp://about.me/bruce.hankins <http://about.me/bruce.hankins> Sent from my iPod Touch On May 22, 2012, at 5:20 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Hi Bruce, Great to hear from you and congrats on the new job! Your official hire date 7.29.2002 -2.21.2005 (then gap in employment) new hire date 3.30.2005 -11.16.2005 (gap in employment) 1.9.2012-2.17.2012. Thanks for the complement on the photo, I just got new ones taken! J Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. My Dashboard says MBO Exec since 01/09/2012. Can you tell me the actual date I started? I accepted a permanent employment position. By the way, you have a great picture on Linkedin.
